Articles.Content:
So, due to an unfortunate happening, I cannot download 1.0 for another few days. Would **you** be so kind as to show me what I'm missing? 

I'd like to see videos too, if that's possible. 

The subject matter doesn't matter at all. Make it 1.0!

Thanks! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Well, we have launch smoke:

![zuFXo3b.png](http://i.imgur.com/zuFXo3b.png)

EDIT:

700th post!

Landing gear and aero:

![mukCmKn.png](http://i.imgur.com/mukCmKn.png)

New plane parts:

![ZEzZiMV.png](http://i.imgur.com/ZEzZiMV.png)

flying in 1.0 aero 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/HZNJiB-m964?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Havin some fun with the new aerodynamics.

![vWcbzta.png](%5Bimg%5Dhttp%3A//i.imgur.com/vWcbzta.png)

Here's my munar drilling site.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/ATaCE)

The launch of the entire facility went surprisingly well. It only took me one attempt. 

I used multiple SRB's for the initial slowdown of the drilling platform, then I landed it using two mainsails.

And pics you shall have:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/kQ6q8)

Rune. First K-Prize entry in 1.0!
Don't fly 5000 meters above sea level or more at 900 m/s or more. It just turns into a giant fireball.

Everyone else was trying the aero, the re-entry heating, the astronaut stuff...

I just built [a truck](http://kerbalx.com/pandoraskitten/KMC-M1-King-Cab---Stock). 

![7v2BND0.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/7v2BND0.jpg)

> 
> Everyone else was trying the aero, the re-entry heating, the astronaut stuff...
> I just built [a truck](http://kerbalx.com/pandoraskitten/KMC-M1-King-Cab---Stock). 
> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/7v2BND0.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/7v2BND0.jpg)

Stock version of your other truck, i see. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

I spent most of the day building the mother of all food trucks for Valentina so she'd have something to do between space missions. But it isn't quite stock... with those tomato wheels!

(Burger Mod and Infernal Robotics)

![0FhXbrT.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/0FhXbrT.jpg)
I see none of other post... There's girl kerbal in game too
